page.title: 01POST OFFICE
page.content:
Sturton _ le _ Steeple Post Office.
Mrs.Palliaser owns the Post Office in Sturton _ le _ Steeple. Her working hours are Monday Tuesday Thursday Friday 9.00am to 12.00 noon then 1.00 to 5.30. Wednesday and Saturday 9.00 to 12.00.She says her busiest days are Mondays and Thursdays Mondays family allowance money supplied by the goverment for mothers with so many children.Thursdays pensions for people over 65 without a job.She has no one else to work in the post office.She sells about 800 stamps a month.She started a shop by request of the people in Sturton.She gets up at about 5.45 for the postman to bring the mail from Retford.
